articles.content:
Critics have blasted fans at the Super Bowl for failing to wear masks properly and disregarding social distancing rules amid fears the game could turn into a Covid super-spreader event.
The hashtag … [+5013 chars]

articles.author: Alex Raskin Sports
articles.title: Buccaneers' Tom Brady wins his SEVENTH Super Bowl as Tampa Bay beats Kansas City, 31-9 - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Tampa Bay Buccaneers won their second Super Bowl on Sunday with a 31-9 victory over the defending champion Kansas City Chiefs as Tom Brady captured his seventh title.
articles.content:
He's two decades and 346 games into the most successful career in NFL history, but Tom Brady still isn't finished winning Super Bowls.
